channel.title: Codex-Max on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Codex-Max on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: ai: What’s new in Microsoft Foundry | Dec 2025 & Jan 2026
item.description:
Microsoft Foundry’s Dec 2025–Jan 2026 updates add several new foundation models, expand audio and fine-tuning capabilities, and introduce SDK changes including an azure-ai-projects v2 beta consolidation.

  • Source: Microsoft AI Foundry Blog

item.title: github: OpenAI’s GPT-5.1-Codex-Max is now in public preview for GitHub Copilot
item.description:
GitHub announced that OpenAI’s GPT-5.1-Codex-Max is rolling out in public preview for GitHub Copilot and will be available to Copilot Pro, Pro+, Business, and Enterprise customers.

  • Source: GitHub
